```{r}
library(metafor)
data("dat.gibson2002")
dat<-escalc(measure="ROM", m1i = m1i, sd1i = sd1i, n1i = n1i,m2i = m2i, sd2i = sd2i, n2i = n2i, data = dat.gibson2002)

meta_dat_model <- rma(data=dat,method="FE",yi=yi,vi=vi)

#Use the forest function on the log-scale
#Remember to conver to exponential form (this is in log scale form)
forest(meta_dat_model, transf = exp, refline = 1)


summary(meta_dat_model)

#Answer 0.574 Lower Bound, and 0.791 Upper Bound
```
